lenders.name: Lisbeth
lenders.loan_because: in the developed world we spend so much money on indifferent things and now it's time to spend it where it actually makes a difference!

lenders.name: Liz Cappon
lenders.loan_because:
I really feel this type of help is inspiring and motivating to all involved.

Your average joe just doesn't see the direct connection & effects when making a small charitable donation.  And of course there is often the perceived threat of blatant mismanagement of funds by organizations.

With Kiva you avoid these pitfalls and make a real difference using real dollars which would be considered small-time by any other non-profit.

Not to mention the fact that the same small amount of funds can repaid to be used over & over again, it really is the gift that keeps on giving.

That is why Kiva is my favorite non-profit organization.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work to publicize & promote businesses using more unique methods than traditional advertising offers, working with the news media & social networking.

When I have free time (I wish I had more! LOL) I enjoy just hanging out with my friends, traveling and playing Texas Hold Em Poker.

My interests include politics, celebrity & how it has effected media and Hip Hop & Dance music.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell commercial and residential real estate. My other business is photography. I do portrait, advertising, landscape, and art photography.

lenders.name: Majd
lenders.loan_because:
i think giving people the opportunity to raise themselves out of poverty will do 2 things: 
1- help end poverty on a more personal level
2- preserve the dignity of the people i'm trying to help, because "dignity is more important to the human spirit than wealth" - Jacqueline Novogratz
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved with Engineers Without Borders - Canada, trying to create a world of opportunity.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: Humanity needs hope.

lenders.name: Sage Media Design Co
lenders.loan_because:
We feel very fortunate to live and work in Canada, and we have seen first-hand the need for a service such as this one.

Sage Media is very proud to support Kiva in helping those who would help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Sage Media is a corporate graphic design company, catering to organizations, entrepreneurs and business start-ups around the world.

lenders.name: Margie
lenders.loan_because:
Hi I am 41 and a single mother of 2 wonderful teenagers. Today I am here to make a request to change my families financial future. I have met a young man by the name of Shea Korte who is a online business consultant. What he does is help other people make money on the internet and lots of it. The business Shea is involved in is called Abunza and this business is taking the internet by storm! Shea is in the top 20 of the Abunza leader board, actually he is number 10. So he is the tenth highest income earner in Abunza so that says alot. The reason I am talking about Shea is beacause he will be my mentor he is going to show me every step of his success so it can become my success. Abunza is the business to get into, it can change my financial future for my family. Attached to my request are videos and links about the business PLEASE check them out so you can see for yourself this business really can change my families future! I need to find a way to get out of the financial crisis I am in so I can support my family and be able to supply their needs. And I know I have found it with Abunza all I need is the start up costs and I will work my tail off to be highly successful! It is my dream to be able to pay ALL my bills on time not pick and choose which ones get paid. It is my dream to go to the mall and buy my children clothes when they need it instead of waiting for a miracle. I dont want my family to go through another eviction from our home it is so painful for them when we get kicked out cause mom cant pay the rent.  I want to be self sufficient and support my family completely on my own that is my wish! PLEASE help me change my life and most importanly my childrens lifes. After my success I want to give back to others so I can help mothers that have gone through the same struggles as I have. Thank you so much for reading my request and I pray everyone that reads this request has a blessing from our Lord and Savior! 
God Bless You,
Margie(Mother of 2) 

I need $1197 dollars to start my business.

P.S. Please make sure you check out the videos and links so you can see the documentation. Thank you in advance for helping me on the road to success!!
lenders.occupational_info:
Here are the video links and website links to see for yourself how successful Abunza is!

http://sheakorte.abunza.com/video.html

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSk7s8OfBys

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UX5jL4eJgog

lenders.occupational_info: I explain things -- things made by the company I work for, things people are thinking about doing, and, when I do my job well,  things people don't understand. I am not particularly wise myself, but I'm good at making other people's wisdom easier for all of the rest of us to comprehend.

lenders.name: Juliet Chiqui
lenders.loan_because: i've existing small business here in the Philippines; but cannot make it run smoothly due to insufficiency of capital. i'm dealing with almost all government agencies here but cannot cope up with the continuity of supply. there are times that i'm penalized with the delay of delivery 'coz i've to borrow with the loan- sharks which put much load on me. thanks to be given infos of your organization through the oprah show. have tried accessing you way back long time ago only that, due to logistic and resources restraint, i'm doing it just from time to time. thank you for all the help and  praise God having known you.
lenders.occupational_info: as i said, i'm registered with the government electronic procurement since aug 2, 2006. have dealt with them long time ago wheni was still employed. it deems me to do it on my own. now, i know thatif you are of insufficient funds, you'll find it hard to go big. right now, have PO with the Senate of the Phil, BSP (Central Bank of the Phil) etal. don't have any employee other than my husband. i do the marketing and he does the deliveries and collection. we will hire transport only for long distance delivery like Clark Development Corporation.we do the business in the least expenditures. by the time, i'll be provided we the much needed capital, i'll go out of my way to go bidding with the much larger scale. again, my heartfelt gratitude having known you and be one of your benefactors.

lenders.name: Claire G
lenders.occupation: student, work in an office on campus
lenders.loan_because: I really like helping people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at the University of Puget Sound and will be graduating May 2009. I am majoring in Comparative Sociology.  After I graduate, I would like to work for a non-profit organization that helps lower-income people or children. I may join the Peace Corps or go to Graduate School to get a degree in social work.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: a helping hand is sometimes a more constructive action than a direct gift.
lenders.occupational_info: always hands on and practical.    I would never ask anyone to do that which I would not do myself

lenders.name: Matias
lenders.loan_because: Civilization exists by geological consent, subject to change without notice. (Will Durant)

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: It's good to feel that I can make a little difference.

lenders.name: Leon
lenders.loan_because:
Give to everyone who asks you, and don’t ask him who takes away your goods to give them back again.
As you would like people to do to you, do exactly so to them. If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners love those who love them. If you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners do the same. If you lend to those from whom you hope to receive, what credit is that to you? Even sinners lend to sinners, to receive back as much. But love your enemies, and do good, and lend, expecting nothing back; and your reward will be great, and you will be children of the Most High; for he is kind toward the unthankful and evil.
Therefore be merciful,
Even as your Father is also merciful.
- Luke 6
lenders.occupational_info: Student Physics, web-programmer, DJ

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who want to become self-reliant so they are able to provide for themselves and their family.  It helps them achieve their dignity and self-worth. I consider it a 'hand up' instead of a 'hand out'.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Education department of Nationwide Children's Hospital planning conferences and CME activities for physicians and health care professionals.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm an accountant for a homebuilding company.  I track costs & revenues, handle payments to employees & vendors, and manage our cash & debt.  I'm also charged with planning, budgeting & forecasting functions.
